Description.Text: Υou will find at Panorama hotel not only the silency and the fresh air which features the whole city, but also the relax and the amazing view from balconies of our hotel thanks to its position.Ηotel offers taxi service, parking(30 places). Regarding the hotel rooms have all the necessary conditions (heating and cooling, air conditioning, with central air conditioner, television, internet, etc..)
Hotel is located in the center of Kruja, at the entrance of the Old Bazaar, in front of the Castle of Kruja.Kruja is 20 km from the capital of Albania,Tirana.
